verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David יְ֭הֹוָה <S%H3068><s%> LORD מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> who יָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> who shall abide בְּאָהֳלֶ֑ךָ <S%H168><s%> tent מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> who יִ֝שְׁכֹּ֗ן <S%H7931><s%> may dwell בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> hill קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H6944><s%> in thy holy

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> He that walketh תָּ֭מִים <S%H8549><s%> uprightly וּפֹעֵ֥ל <S%H6466><s%> and worketh צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness וְדֹבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> and speaketh אֱ֝מֶ֗ת <S%H571><s%> the truth בִּלְבָבֽוֹ׃ <S%H3824><s%> in his heart

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor רָגַ֨ל ׀ <S%H7270><s%> [He that] backbiteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against לְשֹׁנ֗וֹ <S%H3956><s%> not with his tongue לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> nor doeth לְרֵעֵ֣הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to his neighbour רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> evil וְ֝חֶרְפָּ֗ה <S%H2781><s%> a reproach לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor נָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> nor taketh up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against קְרֹֽבוֹ׃ <S%H7138><s%> against his neighbour

נִבְזֶ֤ה ׀ <S%H959><s%> is contemned בְּֽעֵ֘ינָ֤יו <S%H5869><s%> In whose eyes נִמְאָ֗ס <S%H3988><s%> a vile person וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִרְאֵ֣י <S%H3373><s%> them that fear יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יְכַבֵּ֑ד <S%H3513><s%> but he honoureth נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> [He that] sweareth לְ֝הָרַ֗ע <S%H7489><s%> to [his own] hurt וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not יָמִֽר׃ <S%H4171><s%> and changeth

כַּסְפּ֤וֹ ׀ <S%H3701><s%> his money לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> [He that] putteth not out בְּנֶשֶׁךְ֮ <S%H5392><s%> to usury וְשֹׁ֥חַד <S%H7810><s%> reward עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against נָקִ֗י <S%H5355><s%> against the innocent לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> Nor לָ֫קָ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> nor taketh עֹֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> He that doeth אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִמּ֣וֹט <S%H4131><s%> be moved לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> these [things] shall never
